data.about: Full Stack Architect | Lead Experience Engineer | Software Craftsman
data.summary: I am a seasoned software architect with 14 years of diverse experience in software product development. As a full stack architect, I have successfully taken multiple products from 0 to 1. I have a deep expertise in full stack development using technologies such as Typescript, JavaScript, NextJS, ReactJS, NodeJS and Serverless. I have led and architected several multi-million dollar projects including greenfield and rewrites of legacy products. I lead teams effectively, ensuring an environment where people can do their best work.
